author: Leonardo Arboleda

review: Awesome device! Only lost a star because the search (voice or typed) gives results centered around Amazon's products only, and even though apps can be sideloaded, the apps on Amazon's store are very limited at the moment. I also wish we had the option of placing sideloaded apps in the  "Recent apps" list. Just to launch these apps involves us having to dig through menus.Powerful, sleek looking hardware with a beautiful functional menu, this device has a lot of potential. Make it happen Amazon!
